TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. It was the Puella Magi Madoka Magica forum that loved it.

I wish my RC miniature airplane was fixed.

Granted. It can no longer reproduce (you monster).

I wish that this monitor wasn't so yellow tinged.

Granted. It's has an extreme purple tinge now.

I wish I was an astronaut in KSP!

Edited April 12, 2014 by ExplodingRocketShips

Granted. You're stuck in a mk 1-2 capsule with limited life support. Also you're a kerbal and no rescue is coming. On Eve.

I wish I were the soul of a planet.

Granted. You are the soul of a frozen little planet spiraling into a black hole.

I-1-1-12

21-1-1-I

I wish tangle wouldn't send garbled wishes.

Granted.

6EQUJ5!

Grah5HH. ALSDHUHUNnn2323@##Jnknj

I wish for a boulder.

Granted, you must carry the burden of an entire planet (which is the boulder I gave you) on your shoulders.

I wish combusting pockets of air and natural gas bit people instead of avoiding them.

Granted. Each and every one bites a person in your hometown and spontaneously explodes.

BEEP!

B0P!

(im back...)

I wish i had a portal gun.

Granted. However, it is a portal that makes guns.

I wish for that the the had.
Granted, but your are slaughtered by the Grammar Na|zis for bad grammar.

Granted, but you begin to collapse. In the spaghettification way.

I wish that the ear had the two.

Granted. The number 2 is in your ear and you're deaf.

I wish Tylo was a cute pink planet instead of a horrifying doom planet.

Granted, to make it more cute it became smaller, more dense, however it was taken too far and it turned into a black hole.

I wish I had a more powerful computer to not have any lag in KSP.

Granted. Your computer consumes so much electricity you have to pay $5 for every rocket you launch.

I wish The Sun fired Tylo and hired a hip, young horrifying conglomeration of asteroids in his place.

Granted, but Tylo's still there because Squad decided there should be an asteroid belt between Duna and Jool instead. Dres is inside it. Good luck navigating between the E-Classes.

I wish that Peas.

Granted. However, you wished that your dearest friend was peas. ARE YOU HAPPY NOW?!

I wish for the EAROS kinetic ball went fast.

Granted. It is now traveling at the speed of light. And you are comically tied to it.

I wish for more power.

Granted. Your ears are boosters.

I wish for this forum to be purple.

Granted. This negates my yellow tint to the computer. Suddenly, Jeb jumps onto the forum servers and paints the forum green.

I wish that the purple bears with no legs and 18 wings were blue.

Granted. But it's on a painting, because those don't exist.

I wish for tangle to bring back the BEES, but with Beekeepers.

Granted. Because I'm not Tangle, you face horrifying consequences. And beekeepers. You are not satisfied by the lack of Tangle's corruption.

I wish Tylo died from extreme rotational forces.

Granted, you happen to be watching but you're not at a safe distance. You are surrounded by debris with no hope of escape. As you are unable to even speak due to exhaustion, dehydration, and malnutrition, you are impacted by a large piece of debris that leaves you exposed to the vacuum of space.

I wish I could spend a week on the ISS.
